metadata.Title: CVE-2020-16034 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Inappropriate implementation in WebRTC in Google Chrome prior to87.0.4280.66 allowed a local attacker to bypass policy restrictions via acrafted HTML page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-16034` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 87.0.4280.66-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 87.0.4280.66-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 87.0.4280.66-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 87.0.4280.66-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 87.0.4280.66-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '87.0.4280.66-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
